definition: disaster-stricken/to be hit by a natural calamity
to receive/to accept/to suffer/subjected to/to bear/to stand/pleasant/(passive marker)

sentences.english: We must reinforce the relief material for the disaster-hit area.
sentences.chinese: 我们必须增加给受灾地区的救灾物资。

sentences.english: At least 70 dead, millions affected in S China rainstorms .
sentences.chinese: 江西遭受暴雨袭击，至少70人死亡，数百万人受灾。

sentences.english: The crowds gathered about the scene of the disaster.
Points of contact within the affected country's government.
These activities are organized in shelters, congregated groups and homes in devastated communities.
sentences.chinese: 这些活动在受灾人群密集的避难所进行组织。

sentences.english: Praise the bravery of the victims and their families.
sentences.chinese: 让我们赞扬那些勇敢的受灾群众和家庭。

sentences.english: Power grids have been destructed badly in the disaster-stricken areas.
sentences.chinese: 一是受灾地区电网遭到严重破坏。

sentences.english: Status of affected country's response to the disaster.
Some of the hardest hit residents lived in central and southern Tanzania.
sentences.chinese: 某些受灾最严重的居民居住在坦桑尼亚的中南部地区。

sentences.english: The tremor caused widespread blackouts in affected areas.
sentences.chinese: 该震动导致受灾地区大范围停电。

sentences.english: Nearly half the population live in the five disaster-hit states.
sentences.chinese: 接近一半以上的人都住在五个受灾的省份。

sentences.english: To my estimate, not one tenth of the area is affected.
sentences.chinese: 按我的估计受灾的面积还不到十分之一。

sentences.english: The governments of disaster-struck states are making best efforts to restore the normal life of local residents.
sentences.chinese: 受灾各邦政府正尽力早日恢复灾民的正常生活。

sentences.english: The government provided emergency medical aid to the typhoon victims.
sentences.chinese: 政府提供紧急医疗援助给台风的受灾户。

sentences.english: Do not go sightseeing through areas of damage. You will only  hamper the relief effort.
sentences.chinese: 不要穿越受灾区域去看热闹，这样只会妨碍救援行动。

sentences.english: The distribution of ratio of heavy disaster frequency to the area affected by hailstone is basically contrary.
sentences.chinese: 重灾频率和成灾面积比的分布与受灾频率基本相反。

definition: to relieve disaster/to help disaster victims
